author: philip
msg: pool usage to avoid a core dump with pool debugging and --enable-dso.

author: philip
msg: Fix a couple of memory bugs.
(checkout_resource): Set locn to NULL after it has been free'd so that
the memory does not get reused.
(svn_ra_dav__get_locks): Destroy subpool earlier so that it does not get
abandoned by the subsequent SVN_NO_ERROR returns.

author: philip
msg: (svn_fs_bdb__locks_get): Catch errors when closing the cursor.

author: glasser
msg: Tweak shebang lines of scripts invoked from Makefile
using bash to use /bin/bash instead of /bin/sh.
